foreignData.name: Wiederaufblühen der Dryaden
foreignData.text:
Bringe eine Karte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
Rückblende {4}{G} (Du kannst diese Karte aus deinem Friedhof für ihre Rückblendekosten wirken. Schicke sie danach ins Exil.)

foreignData.name: Resurgir de la dríada
foreignData.text:
Regresa la carta objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.
Retrospectiva {4}{G}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta desde tu cementerio pagando su coste de retrospectiva. Luego exíliala.)

foreignData.name: Réanimation de la dryade
foreignData.text:
Renvoyez une carte ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
Flashback {4}{G} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte depuis votre cimetière pour son coût de flashback. Exilez-la ensuite.)

foreignData.name: Rinascita della Driade
foreignData.text:
Riprendi in mano una carta bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
Flashback {4}{G} (Puoi lanciare questa carta dal tuo cimitero pagando il suo costo di flashback. Poi esiliala.)

foreignData.name: ドライアドの蘇生
foreignData.text:
あなたの墓地にあるカード１枚を対象とする。それをあなたの手札に戻す。
フラッシュバック{4}{G}（あなたはあなたの墓地にあるこのカードをフラッシュバック・コストで唱えてもよい。その後、これを追放する。）

foreignData.name: 드라이어드의 부활
foreignData.text:
당신의 무덤에 있는 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
회상 {4}{G} (당신은 이 카드의 회상 비용을 지불해 이 카드를 당신의 무덤에서 발동할 수 있다. 그 후 이 카드를 추방한다.)

foreignData.name: Revitalização da Dríade
foreignData.text:
Devolva o card alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
Recapitular {4}{G} (Você pode conjurar este card de seu cemitério pagando seu custo de recapitular. Depois, exile-o.)

foreignData.name: Возрождение Дриады
foreignData.text:
Верните целевую карту из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
Воспоминание {4}{G} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту из вашего кладбища за ее стоимость Воспоминания. Затем изгоните ее.)

foreignData.name: 树灵复生
foreignData.text:
将目标牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
返照{4}{G}（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

foreignData.name: 樹靈復生
foreignData.text:
將目標牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
返照{4}{G}（你可以從你墳墓場中施放此牌，並支付其返照費用，然後將它放逐。）

name: Dryad's Revival
originalText:
Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
Flashback {4}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

rulings.text: “Flashback [cost]” means “You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying [cost] rather than paying its mana cost” and “If the flashback cost was paid, exile this card instead of putting it anywhere else any time it would leave the stack.”

You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions, including those based on the card's type. For instance, you can cast a sorcery using flashback only when you could normally cast a sorcery.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a flashback cost) you're paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.
A spell cast using flashback will always be exiled afterward, whether it resolves, is countered, or leaves the stack in some other way.
You can cast a spell using flashback even if it was somehow put into your graveyard without having been cast.
If a card with flashback is put into your graveyard during your turn, you can cast it if it's legal to do so before any other player can take any actions.

text:
Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
Flashback {4}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
